title: (x) Headline sans with little swashes in Grafik Magazine - Soda Script {Pieter}
content:
Would someone please help us identify this font? its from the lateset numeber of grafik magazine.  
Would really appreciate it. Or tips on cimilar fonts? -Easy to read letters with a little something extra.  
Trying to avoid fonts that are used way to much and other “clichè fonts”.

Love, Johnny Jaywalker.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007163030im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/CIMG4295.jpg)

 [‹ tiny sans "Testing"](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007163030/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18624 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Ice Age movie logo - Fink Gothic {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007163030/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18625 "Go to next forum topic")
author: johnny jaywalker

comments.content:
It’s Soda Sript by Zuzana Licko.  
 [http://www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PSodB.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007163030/http:/www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PSodB.html "http://www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PSodB.html")

thank you very much, that was quick.

put ya stunna shades on
